storyInfo:
Istina tries to treat herself inside her dorm, but at that time, May knocks on her door to visit.
Accompanying May is Natalya, another member of the Ursus Student Self-Governing Group.

attributes.content: It's plugged in.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is it recording? 'Test. Test.'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Seems all right.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Now what should I say?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Closure lent me this device for the purposes of... Well, the application says 'recording self-diagnosis and treatment of trauma using exposure therapy and related methods.'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: A mouthful indeed.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It is a very simple machine to operate. I just check that the battery is charged, toggle this switch... And now it will record automatically.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Talking to yourself is so difficult.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (I honestly thought it would be easier to just open up to a screen.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: When I asked about alleviating or at least controlling my symptoms, the medical staff suggested this...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: 'Why not try talking it through with yourself...?' They made it sound so easy.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Okay, we have video now. Not that I'll be showing this to anyone. Not that I would ever want to show this to anyone.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Calm down, Istina. No need to be nervous. We're all friends here. Just speak your mind. Let it out.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: All those things you've been unable to share with others, you can say to yourself. Over and over again.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's certainly a feasible idea.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: So let's take us back...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: While it may seem like there's nothing wrong, I know, sooner or later, we will have to deal with this. With so much.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I know that Gummy and Natalya can never forget those things. What happened in the school... what happened after we left the school... No one could forget.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And Zima, she... I think she has been having nightmares recently. Leto seems like she was able to let it go, but... can someone ever truly let it go?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: As for me? I believe I can face up to it. But can I, actually...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: No one will speak of it. But somehow we will have to come to terms with it, in the end.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Still hard.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Phew... all right. I do think I am starting to get used to it though.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Let's begin, for real this time.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I suppose I'll introduce myself first?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I am called 'Istina'——This is, of course, a codename. My true name is Anna Morozova.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mmm. It's a name I've not heard in a long time. It is my name, of course, but it feels somewhat unfamiliar. How strange.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: This is Vika. A good friend of mine.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Vika was my best friend before I joined the Student Self-Governing Group.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Now I live at the headquarters of an organization called Rhodes Island, where I am classified as part of the 'Ursus Student Self-Governing Group.'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mm. This group was my idea, but it was Zima who truly founded it. And while we are indeed independent, at the moment there are only five of us.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Zima, Natalya, Leto, Gummy, and myself.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There used to be more. But we are the only ones left.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ah, of course, Vika is also a member.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We currently serve as 'Operators' for this Rhodes Island... I suppose it's a kind of job.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I don't mind it. Fair pay for fair work.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Zima has no plans to leave, for the time being. And although she does not speak her mind, I know she is satisfied here. And from time to time, I find myself thinking it would be nice to stay.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Phew.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The truth is, while we're all together now, we did not come from the same school.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Gummy, Natalya, and I attended the same high school. Zima and Leto went to another one.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, but Zima was sort of famous, even at our school. In fact, every student in the district knew about her.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I suppose she is something of a born leader. I recognize that she was the right choice to lead us.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Reunion found us defenseless and occupied Chernobog, our city.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Then some... things... happened. Reunion took a handful of kids from our school, me among them, and marched us over to Zima's campus.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There may have been students from other schools there too. I'm not certain. It was a chaotic time.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's still not clear why they did it. But it was all orchestrated by the white-haired boy leading that Reunion outfit.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I think he may have been even younger than us? I don't know.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I got the impression he had to convince the other leaders to round up the students, at which point they locked us inside Zima's school.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Looking back now, it all seems ridiculous.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We were locked in there for maybe two weeks, and...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anna!
Phew! Thank heaven it's you.
Pull me up, Anna.
...Anna?
...and we fought.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We fought within the sealed-up school. And when we managed to escape from it, we fought in the city blocks of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Every one of us has something we must come to terms with.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We——
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (It wouldn't be Gummy this early. Who could it be...?)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Just a minute.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (I think I'll just leave the recording running. I don't want to worry about saving and closing it.)
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's me!
Who?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh? I'm surprised at you, Junior Detective Istina! How could you not recognize my voice? Are you playing dumb?
Could you keep it down?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And I've told you a thousand times, I'm not your junior detective.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hah. You two are getting along nicely.
Good afternoon, Anna. I'm here to bother you too.
Natalya?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Tea.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ah, thank you!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Mmm...It smells fantastic. A fine tea indeed!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: By the way, you took quite a while to open the door. Are you busy, Istina? Are we interrupting you?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: We could always come back later. I really only came to return this book.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I'm not busy. Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Not with anything pressing anyway.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Relax. If Anna says we're not bothering her, we're not bothering her.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Anna doesn't lie about things like that, now does she?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hehe. Glad to hear it!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh, but I never expected you were the type to lock your door. How cautious.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And handy! That kind of caution will serve a junior detective well!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I've been very clear with you that I'm not interested in this junior detective nonsense.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And besides, I just happened to have a reason to lock the door this time.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But I'd think you are the type to lock your door, actually. Anna's always been the most cautious of us.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Don't tease me, Natalya.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Heh heh. I just can't help myself with that adorable face of yours.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anyway, it's quite nice that you take high tea in the afternoon. As it should be!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: You really have a thing for tea, huh...? Your face, with that expression, it reminds me of freshly browned toast.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What? What's that supposed to mean?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I suppose it means you look silly.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh? How dare you? That's over the line!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hmph. No matter! Look how magnanimous your senior detective is. I even brought you biscuits!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh? Biscuits? Now that's unexpected...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is it?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Sorry, I didn't expect you to bring snacks. I figured you only came to mooch some tea. I misjudged you.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm not some freeloader!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Look, I prepared an extra special thank you gift! With Hibiscus's famous vegetable scones——!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Very good. Let's see you off now. Hurry on back where you came from.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Right now, immediately, through the door and to the right. Have a nice day.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey now, you needn't be so forceful. The scones are delightful, I promise.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Here, try one.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: No thank you... Really, stop, I... Don't just shove it in——
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mmmf! Mmmrrfff...!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ahahahahaha! Now this is what I meant by you two getting along. I'm jealous.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Utter nonsense. You think we're getting along? / Hehe, like two peas in a pod, eh?
attributes.name: Istina & May

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Not that we get along poorly, I'd say we just...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I had this all wrong. We don't like each other at all!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Na- Natalya!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Haha, pffft, hahaha! S- sorry, I just... You two clearly connect on a deeper level than I thought. Pff-hahaha!
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Uh.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There's no way we could be that funny. But whatever... May's here to give back my book. What brings you over, Natalya?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Me? I've had some things on my mind lately. Things I want to talk over with you.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Oh? Important things? That's not like you. Especially to have you come to me.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey now, I've always been close to you, Anna.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But it's really nothing that important. We can come back to it later. Let's enjoy our tea time for now.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Yes, let's.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Woah, May! Be careful! Don't go prancing around with your teacup. It'll spill.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm not a child! It won't spill.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Sorry, I wasn't expecting guests, so the room's a bit messy.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There isn't a good place to entertain guests in the dormitory. But you don't have to stand there, Natalya. Just sit anywhere, like May.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'll take you up on that.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island does provide nicely furnished dorms. Clean and tidy ones at that.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: You're right that they don't make for good house parties though. Not like we used to have.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Those were more banquets than parties.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh? Banquets?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What's the difference?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: They're completely different!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Are they?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ooh, a banquet sounds lovely...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Let's not get carried away.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: That was another time. The big house, the lifestyle, none of it has anything to do with who I am now.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: And that Sonya, she always teases me about it. Tactless.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: If it weren't for you, Anna, I'm sure Sonya would be butting heads with everyone left and right.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: I honestly think we live quite well right now. It's leagues better than when they had me on undercover investigations.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And by the way, Istina, your room is already very clean. You've got so many books, and they're all so well-organized.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: We're still in the midst of setting it all straight. And Gummy's always been rather fastidious.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That's true. Our Gummy does like to sort things.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Even back in those days, in a place like that, she'd still keep everything we gathered all nicely sorted.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Same as she ever was.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: A place like what...?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: But a tidy roommate could be great, or I suppose it could be hell.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh, and who's this lovely little doll here?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Don't touch her!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Eep!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Wh- what's the matter? You scared the life out of me.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: You didn't have to be so rough.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: My... apologies...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's just, this is something very important to me.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That's...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Anna, didn't that belong to...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: So you took the doll with you, you——
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Please stop talking, Natalya.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Stop talking.
I'm fine. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...Anna...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Stop talking.
I heard about it... what happened back then...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: There was nothing anyone could have done. No one could have known.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Stop talking!
...It was tragic. But we all know it wasn't your fault.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Shut up!!
You were just a second too late. You did all you could.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: I know. Thank you. I'm fine, Natalya.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm fine.
That's what I've always said to everyone.
Zima, Gummy, Leto, Natalya... They all think I'll be fine.
I almost believe it myself.
It wasn't my fault.
Or was it?
I just got there too late.
No, I wasn't late.
I did all I could.
...all I could.
——I'd already made my choice.
Ah, this book! Isn't it the last volume of the detective series I've been reading?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hm? Oh, that one. Yes, you have a good eye.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: This is the most precious title in the series. The final act in the story of the world's greatest detective... Hmph, I had to beg the Doctor over and over again to help me hunt it down.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, that reminds me... Back in the old country, I saw what I'm pretty sure was a signed copy of the first edition on the bookshelf at home.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh the memories. I cried my eyes out the first time I read it!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Autographed... and a first edition at that...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, what rotten luck.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: I remember Sonya saying Anna moved mountains to try to get any signed copy of that author's work. And she's still empty-handed.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: They're just too rare.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: (Uh oh. It was that special, was it? There's too much old stuff like that back home. I never noticed!)
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Um, err, anyway, Istina. Could you, uh, lend me this book?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: ...I can. But didn't you say you'd read it before?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Grumbling) A first edition. Signed. Copy?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, well... I did, but it's been so long, you see. It's about time for a reread.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: It- it's really quite something that you've got a book like this here. Hahaha, you can read it anytime you like!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: When you put it that way, I suppose I ought to lend it to you. For now.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, Istina, that's marvelous! You're the greatest!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: (Phew... No problem there then.)
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Grumbling) You could stand to be a little more aware of the feelings of others.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: (Quietly) But nevertheless... thanks.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Did you say something?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh, these biscuits are to die for. You really won't have one, Istina?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I didn't say anything.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: They're just normal biscuits, are they? I could have a taste...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But I didn't expect to see you and Natalya together. How do you know one another?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, I wouldn't say we know each other that well. Natalya just happened to lend a hand when I was covertly investigating Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Glad I could help.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: You talk about investigating Penguin Logistics quite a bit. Still haven't given up on that, eh?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'll never give up! I've staked my reputation as a Royal Detective——
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Personally, I think you've long since forfeited your reputation as a Royal Detective.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Why you...! Hmph. I've had just about enough of you!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The point is, we only happened to bump into each other on the way here.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What's more, the last book I borrowed from you was absolutely riveting. I just had to come talk about it as soon as I turned the last page!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Well, that's not entirely off the table...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's been a while since I had a good talk about detective novels. And the plot in that one is indeed one of my favorites. 'Riveting,' you said?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I most certainly did! How does one even come up with such a twisty plot? Ooh, I swear my hair stood on ends as I read the final reveal!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I'm sure. It's a perfect cocktail of literary creativity and logical deduction that jabs the reader right in the psyche. Easily my favorite one in the series.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh——I see. It's so clear to me!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: It was written in the first person, so... The murderer was actually the protag——mmffst. Mmffmm?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Fool! You can't just spoil the whole thing! Natalya hasn't read it yet!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mmmmmpf!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Pfah——Haah! You almost killed me...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Nnng! I bit my tongue. That hurt. I understand not wanting spoilers, but that was way out of line, Istina!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Interesting. You really like your detective novels, eh, Anna? I don't usually see you so excited to talk about something.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Oh? R- really?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Really. In fact, I think you'll have to let me read one too. Since they're clearly so compelling.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: You want to read too, Natalya? I never would have imagined. Every time I asked you before, you'd say the same thing: 'When I have time.'
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Huh. Is that right...?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But when I see the two of you crowing on about these books, I can't help but want to join in.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: All right then. The more the merrier.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: There really aren't many people here who can hold a conversation about great art... The Doctor reads, but finding time for a conversation is no simple task.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The Doctor... Ah, you mean that one commander.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: I see you're familiar, Natalya?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I am. That one is quite a unique presence on this vessel. And I've had the pleasure of bearing witness to that particular commander's field operations.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: It's too bad. There's some special meeting or some-such on today. I wanted to give the Doctor a biscuit.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm sure Hibiscus will make sure the Doctor gets a share.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yes. Dr. Kal'tsit keeps a close eye, but it's clear that everyone is just as concerned about the Doctor.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: The medical staff, in particular. I went for a test recently and overheard several medics discussing adjustments to the Doctor's diet... I believe the confiscation of snacks was mentioned?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hahahaha. That's a fairly reasonable step, no?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Gummy was moaning about that too. Honestly, what does that one eat every day?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Also, what was that about a 'test,' Natalya?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, I would appreciate some discretion in this matter. I haven't made up my mind yet, but... it is why I came here today.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: However...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Now's not the time, actually. Let's come back to it another day.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: You'll know soon, Anna. In all likelihood.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: All right then. I won't pry.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ahem, let's get back to the matter at hand. Why don't we start Natalya off with the classics?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, is that the matter at hand then?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Hehe, it's an excellent opportunity to introduce a friend to your beloved hobby.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I wouldn't let this go so easily.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ooh... you're positively oozing passion right now.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But of course!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Don't underestimate the power of the detective novel. No matter the type, a masterwork carries a living soul within it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Heh heh. That's an Annaism if I've ever heard one. But that doesn't make it any less true.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Reasoning out the plot of a novel is part of the fun, but the true draw of the detective genre goes much deeper.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Istina speaks the truth, but I have to say my favorite part is always when the detective unmasks the true culprit.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And if we're talking classics, we of course have to talk about 'that one,' eh?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: 'That one?' Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: 'That one!' Yes!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: 'One truth prevails! The murderer is——You!'
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh, I know that one. It's a detective's catchphrase.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Righto. No matter how many times I hear it, it still gets my heart racing!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But in my opinion, it's after the culprit is found that the real thinking, the real interesting bit begins.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Allow me to answer your question with another question, May. Upon cornering the criminal, and after arriving at the truth, what is it the detective should do?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Should she announce the truth to everyone, securing a conviction?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Even when the truth is clear, the law may from time to time be an ineffective remedy. What then, can she do?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Does she allow this criminal to get away with his crimes? Or does she take the law into her own hands?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Such things happen in the real world too. With no simple solution.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: If I were her...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: ...Hmm.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Did you just want to drop that one on us?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What are you even talking about, Istina? You've been acting off all day. Are you feeling alright?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: ...No, no fever?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: A detective's duty is to uncover the truth. The rest is up to the police, of course. She can't play judge, jury, and executioner.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Every part of the justice system plays a role. The police, the courts, and detectives like us. Isn't that obvious?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What's that face now? Did I say something so shocking?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Of course I know a detective can't legally convict a criminal.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I just never expected to hear you talk sense...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hey now! What's that supposed to mean?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Nothing. Just talking to myself.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Now, given the world we live in, we've got a fair number of people who pass their days killing and killing. Murder may not seem a crime of particularly immediate concern, but we'll set that aside for the moment.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: It remains our duty, as detectives, to seek out the truth and uphold the law to the best of our abilities.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: We may not pass judgment. We may not go above the law. We may not exact our own justice.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: To do harm to others, no matter how we may package it, is an immoral act. The character of such behavior is immutable.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Indeed. You're right...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Whether or not the crime is ever known to others, whether or not judgment is ever passed, the knowledge of the crime lives forever within the criminal.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And it is the detective who digs out that truth! Ah ha! Just saying things like that feels so stupendously cool!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: The knowledge of the crime...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: No matter the justification, regardless of whether or not it is known to the world, what's done is done.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: And someday...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh my, our little chat here has turned rather dour.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: ...Sorry. I shouldn't have brought it up.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh no, it was quite the enlightening discussion to witness. But on the rare occasion we meet again for afternoon tea, let's discuss something a bit lighter.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Yes. Good idea.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The tea's gone cold.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hm? Is that...?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What is it, May? You stood up just to have something catch your eye?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's, well, see for yourselves. What's that outside the window?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Hm? The window? Let me see.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Oh, it's... flying? And flying this way.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Looks like some sort of drone?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: A drone?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It is a drone... But what is it doing out here? Actually, I think it's caught on the rigging.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ah! Well, if it's attached to the landship, it can't be a threat, eh? Nothing to worry about then.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Upsies.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Are you mad?! Don't just go diving out windows!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hehe, gotcha——
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: May! Watch your footing!
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Waaaah——
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: *Gasp*!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anna!
Phew! Thank heaven it's you.
She slipped just like that.
Her body wafted back and forth, the breeze blowing her long hair, so clean it clashed with the scene around us. That stark contrast made it seem like the entire episode was nothing but a dream.
Pull me up, Anna.
I froze. Silent.
...Anna?
With a light touch, the dream slipped away.
No words. No sound. Just a few small marks on my fingertips.
...Anna, please, what are you doing?!
I just watched her fall.
May! That was so reckless! Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: It definitely hurts, but I'm alright. Nothing permanent.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Oh, but there's a note taped to the drone!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: And it's for you, Natalya.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Huh? For me?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Ah!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: May...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Wow, what happened? You look like you've seen a ghost!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: ...I'm fine.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Are you sure? You're definitely not sick? I wouldn't think any less of you.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Fool.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What kind of absolute moron would dive out a window and go hanging from the rigging just to get her hands on a mysterious drone?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: A woman with a brain would use a tool, or ask me to use my Arts!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well I didn't think of that, okay?!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Use your head next time!
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Don't scare me like that. Idiot.
Give me your hand.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Eh? No need for that, I'm really okay.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: You scratched your hand on the windowsill.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Don't play dumb with me. I see right through you. You have a terrible poker face.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Your eyes are way too sharp.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: As a 'junior detective,' keen powers of observation are a must, no?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Ack.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: Well, it's not a deep cut. We'll just wipe it clean, apply some disinfectant... and we're done.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: But you'll still want to have a medic operator look at it, no matter how small the wound.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It's nothing serious. Don't get so worked up!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: But thanks all the same. Hehe.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: The note is a summons from Silence.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Dr. Silence?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yes, it's about the test I mentioned before.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: But it's kind of scary. How did Dr. Silence know I was here?
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Anything's possible with drones, right? From Dr. Kal'tsit on down, the medics all have their ways...
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: That's for sure.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Sorry, Anna, it seems I'm off to Medical.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: No problem. It's clearly something important. Go take care of it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Well, I'd better be on my way then too.
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: I've returned your book, and borrowed another. A complete success!
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: What's a complete success?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Let's do this again soon.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: If all goes well, I'm looking forward to telling the whole Self-Governing Group the good news.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Yes. As am I.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Anna...
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Nothing. Forget it.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Until next time.
attributes.name: Natalya

attributes.content: Toodle-oo~
attributes.name: May

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: 'The good news,' huh?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Vika, tell me, what exactly will that good news be?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Natalya, and Zima, or Sonya... if they can get along...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Is such a thing possible? Yes, I think so too.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I have never forgotten about you. About what happened to you.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Would you blame me, if I did? You would, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: No? I know that's not true. I know you, Vika. And I know that's a lie. In fact, I know you can't speak at all.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: You've been with me for so long. You're still by my side today.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: One day, we must all come to terms...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: ...But not today. Not now.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: It seems... I am not strong enough. I still can't do it. Not yet.
attributes.name: Istina
